meanings.definition: A derogatory term for a Jewish person.
meanings.sent1: He was hurt when someone called him a kike at school.
meanings.sent2: The community came together to support the victims of the kike slur.
meanings.sent3: The comedian made a tasteless joke using the word kike.
meanings.sent4: Using the term kike to insult someone is like throwing a stone at a glass house.
meanings.sent5: The word kike is a hurtful label that should never be used.

meanings.sent1: The scammer tried to kike unsuspecting people out of their money.
meanings.sent2: It is important to always be honest and never kike others.
meanings.sent3: Trying to kike your way out of a difficult situation will only lead to trouble.
meanings.sent4: She felt betrayed when she realized her friend was trying to kike her.
meanings.sent5: The con artist's plan was to kike innocent people with fake promises.
